mapper.insert: insert into t_wms_menu (ID, GMTCREATE, NAMECREATE, GMTMODIFIED, NAMEMODIFIED, ISDELETED, WMSID, MENUSERIAL, MENUNAME, PRICE, STATUS) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wmsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuserial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update t_wms_menu set GMTCREATE = #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, NAMECREATE = #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GMTMODIFIED = #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, NAMEMODIFIED = #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISDELETED = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, WMSID = #{wmsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MENUSERIAL = #{menuserial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MENUNAME = #{menuname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, GMTCREATE, NAMECREATE, GMTMODIFIED, NAMEMODIFIED, ISDELETED, WMSID, MENUSERIAL, MENUNAME, PRICE, STATUS from t_wms_menu where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, GMTCREATE, NAMECREATE, GMTMODIFIED, NAMEMODIFIED, ISDELETED, WMSID, MENUSERIAL, MENUNAME, PRICE, STATUS from t_wms_menu
